page.title: 13OLD PEOPLE, MY GRANNY
page.content: My granny lives on her own as she can go up and down stairs easily. She is very fit and able, but my dad comes up sometimes. She does not drink much tea or coffee. My granny likes travelling and prefers to arrive at her destination! She has been to Colorado and Vancouver. She loves to see her grandchildren and quite enjoys having them to stay. She enjoys gardening but it exhausts her. She loves growing plants and flowers. She is very good at arranging them. Cindy, a Cairn dog, needs a walk every day. She loves seeing the children at school. My granny was born in 1910 and will be 75 next birthday. Susan Lyttle, aged 10.
